definitions.definition: A communication , or what is communicated ; any concept or information conveyed.
examples: We've just received an urgent message from the President.
He received a message telling him to update his laptop.

definitions.definition: An underlying theme or conclusion to be drawn from something.
examples: The main message of the novel is that time heals all wounds.

definitions.label_groups: UK , Ireland , chiefly in the plural

main_definition: A communication , or what is communicated ; any concept or information conveyed.
secondary_definitions: An underlying theme or conclusion to be drawn from something.
( UK , Ireland , chiefly in the plural ) An errand .
( Ireland , Scotland , Northern England ) See messages ( “ groceries, shopping ” ) .
